actor-start.eventDescription: Initial fee for starting the MCP Server Actor

get-income-statements.eventDescription: Fee for retrieving company income statements using the get_income_statements tool.

get-balance-sheets.eventDescription: Fee for retrieving company balance sheets using the get_balance_sheets tool.

get-cash-flow-statements.eventDescription: Fee for retrieving company cash flow statements using the get_cash_flow_statements tool.

get-current-stock-price.eventDescription: Fee for retrieving current stock price using the get_current_stock_price tool.

get-historical-stock-prices.eventDescription: Fee for retrieving historical stock prices using the get_historical_stock_prices tool.

get-company-news.eventDescription: Fee for retrieving company news using the get_company_news tool.

get-available-crypto-tickers.eventDescription: Fee for retrieving available crypto tickers using the get_available_crypto_tickers tool.

get-crypto-prices.eventDescription: Fee for retrieving crypto prices using the get_crypto_prices tool.

get-historical-crypto-prices.eventDescription: Fee for retrieving historical crypto prices using the get_historical_crypto_prices tool.

get-current-crypto-price.eventDescription: Fee for retrieving current crypto price using the get_current_crypto_price tool.
